markdownRemark.html:
Lex iniusta non est lex

— Augustin d'Hippone (attributed), The Encyclopedia of language and linguistics, Volume IV by J.M.Y. Simpson and R.E. Asher

An unjust law is no law at all

— Saint Augustine, The Encyclopedia of language and linguistics, Volume IV by J.M.Y. Simpson and R.E. Asher

frontmatter.author: Saint Augustine of Hippo
frontmatter.title: An unjust law is no law at all
